oak_runner_jentic_integration.overview: Local workflow execution for IMAGINATION G business transformation

discovered_workflows.description: Compares the seller's current official customer service metric rating with the projected rating for a specific metric type (e.g., 'Item Not As Described') to understand performance trends.
Creates a pipeline for an application deployment, adds an incoming hook to trigger it, and then triggers the hook.
Creates an issue security scheme, adds security levels to it, assigns members to those levels, and finally associates the scheme with a project.
Creates a project brief for an existing project to document its goals and scope, and then updates it.
Creates a new project and then adds a specific environment (e.g., staging) to that project.

workflow_development_cycle.step_1_discovery: Use jentic to find relevant business APIs and workflows
workflow_development_cycle.step_2_download: Download workflow execution files through jentic
workflow_development_cycle.step_4_customization: Adapt workflows for IMAGINATION G use cases
workflow_development_cycle.step_5_client_deployment: Deploy tested workflows to client environments

drift_diagnostic_automation.description: Automate data collection for organizational drift assessment
drift_diagnostic_automation.local_testing: Test API integrations with client systems using oak-runner

weapon_deployment_automation.description: Automate implementation of business transformation interventions
weapon_deployment_automation.local_testing: Validate intervention workflows before client deployment

client_onboarding_automation.description: Streamline process of connecting to client systems
client_onboarding_automation.local_testing: Test integration workflows with common business platforms

drift_detection_workflows.decision_velocity_tracker: Monitor project management APIs for decision speed
drift_detection_workflows.meeting_efficiency_analyzer: Track calendar/communication APIs for meeting outcomes
drift_detection_workflows.consultant_dependency_monitor: Analyze expense/vendor APIs for external reliance
drift_detection_workflows.binary_choice_assessor: Evaluate decision patterns through workflow analysis

intervention_workflows.clarity_catalyst_automation: Automate scheduling and tracking of clarity sessions
intervention_workflows.market_smackdown_execution: Automate market analysis and competitive positioning

authority_building_workflows.progress_reporting: Real-time client dashboard and report generation
authority_building_workflows.research_data_aggregation: Compile anonymized insights across client base
authority_building_workflows.thought_leadership_content: Generate content from workflow execution data

immediate_implementation_steps: Set up local oak-runner testing environment
Download sample workflows through jentic for common business APIs

business_value.risk_reduction: Test all workflows locally before client deployment
business_value.faster_development: Rapid prototyping and iteration of business automation
business_value.cost_effectiveness: Local testing reduces cloud costs and dependencies
business_value.scalability: Build reusable workflow library for all clients
